Uses of Package
org.azeckoski.reflectutils

Packages that use org.azeckoski.reflectutils
org.azeckoski.reflectutils A set of reflection utilities and miscellaneous utilities related to working with classes and their fields with no dependencies which is compatible with java 1.5 and generics. 
org.azeckoski.reflectutils.beanutils The beanutils compatibility classes that add support for dynabeans and dynaclasses 
org.azeckoski.reflectutils.converters The converters which convert various java objects into other java objects (e.g. string => int, array => string, etc.) 
 

Classes in org.azeckoski.reflectutils used by org.azeckoski.reflectutils
ClassData
           
ClassDataCacher
          Class which provides access to the analysis objects and the cached reflection data
ClassFields
           
ClassFields.FieldFindMode
          Mode for finding the fields on classes/objects:
ClassFields.FieldFindMode.HYBRID (default)
ClassFields.FieldsFilter
          Indicates the fields filtering to use when retrieving fields from types/objects:
ClassFields.FieldsFilter.COMPLETE (default)
ClassProperty
          Simple class for holding the values we care about for a single field, if it uses getters and setters then they must be like this:
If the fieldName is "thing" then:
getter: Object getThing() and setter: void setThing(Object value)
Warning: Note that the values in this object may be garbage collected at any time, do not store this object, it is meant for immediate short term use only
ConstructorUtils
          Class which provides methods for dealing with class constructors, also provides access to all the public constructors for a class
ConversionUtils
          Class which provides methods for converting between object types, can be extended with various converters
DeepUtils
          Class which provides methods for handling deep operations:
deep copy - make a copy of one object into another which traverses the entire object and duplicates all data down to immutable/simple fields
deep clone - clone an object by traversing it and making a copy of every field
deep map - turn an object into a map with only simple objects in it, all contained objects become nested maps
populate - turn a map into an object, can handle params maps (from a servlet request) and nested or non-nested string->object maps
DeepUtils.CopyDestination
           
FieldUtils
          Class which provides methods for dealing with the fields in objects and classes, this provides the core functionality for the reflect util class

Setting and getting fields supports simple, nested, indexed, and mapped values:
Simple: Get/set a field in a bean (or map), Example: "title", "id"
Nested: Get/set a field in a bean which is contained in another bean, Example: "someBean.title", "someBean.id"
Indexed: Get/set a list/array item by index in a bean, Example: "myList[1]", "anArray[2]"
Mapped: Get/set a map entry by key in a bean, Example: "myMap(key)", "someMap(thing)"
FieldUtils.Holder
           
ReflectUtils
          Reflection utilities and utilities related to working with classes and their fields

These are built to be compatible with Apache Commons BeanUtils and the nesting structure works the same, refer to the apache BeanUtils project docs for details

Handles field operations for properties (getters and setters), partial properties (only getter or only setter), and fields.
 

Classes in org.azeckoski.reflectutils used by org.azeckoski.reflectutils.beanutils
ClassFields.FieldsFilter
          Indicates the fields filtering to use when retrieving fields from types/objects:
ClassFields.FieldsFilter.COMPLETE (default)
 

Classes in org.azeckoski.reflectutils used by org.azeckoski.reflectutils.converters
ConstructorUtils
          Class which provides methods for dealing with class constructors, also provides access to all the public constructors for a class
ConversionUtils
          Class which provides methods for converting between object types, can be extended with various converters
DeepUtils
          Class which provides methods for handling deep operations:
deep copy - make a copy of one object into another which traverses the entire object and duplicates all data down to immutable/simple fields
deep clone - clone an object by traversing it and making a copy of every field
deep map - turn an object into a map with only simple objects in it, all contained objects become nested maps
populate - turn a map into an object, can handle params maps (from a servlet request) and nested or non-nested string->object maps
FieldUtils
          Class which provides methods for dealing with the fields in objects and classes, this provides the core functionality for the reflect util class

Setting and getting fields supports simple, nested, indexed, and mapped values:
Simple: Get/set a field in a bean (or map), Example: "title", "id"
Nested: Get/set a field in a bean which is contained in another bean, Example: "someBean.title", "someBean.id"
Indexed: Get/set a list/array item by index in a bean, Example: "myList[1]", "anArray[2]"
Mapped: Get/set a map entry by key in a bean, Example: "myMap(key)", "someMap(thing)"
